reviewText: Awesome video. I highlyrics recommend them. Great way to help teach sight words.
Did not keep there attention as I had hoped.

My son's Kindergarten class uses this DVD to learn to spell the colors, so I purchased it when my son was having trouble learning sight words initially.  The songs are catchy and all 3 of my children sing them now (even my 4 and 2 year olds)!  I highly recommend this for 3-7 year olds.
My first grade students are learning their sight words so much faster than through traditional drills. I highly recommend this series.
As a kindergarten teacher and a mother of a 4 and 6 year old this is wonderful. It keeps their attention, gets them moving, and helps them learn.
Not only do my students love the song, but they are LEARNING! It is my favorite tool for teaching sight words to squirmy kinders.
Great addition to my classroom!  My students love Heidi Songs and so do I!
Good learning tool for some but the songs move along too fast to keep up with the words.
I love Heidi's Songs!! Her DVDs are an excellent addition to anyone teaching a child high frequency words.
Use this for school. Really like it.
Exactly as described. Came in within the dates expected.
My two and a half year old granddaughter loves this!
